posts.post_title: WTT: My Shipke SGC A for your Sovereign T205/T206
posts.post_content:
Anybody want to trade?

Take Care,

[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r181/HercDriver_photo/T206ShipkeFront_zpsfba62411.jpg[/IMG]

Forgot the back.  It's an "A," although it's not bad except that it has a pinhole above his head.  It has wavy borders on top and bottom, maybe a bad trim job?  I'd call it Fair.

Take Care,
Geno
